\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 70234}

\subsection*{Wowzers}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Tyler}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 150 mg & oral & Pharms - Pregabalin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 1 glass & oral & Alcohol - Beer/Wine & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
My friend suffers from MD, and when this drug first hit shelves, he got a sample bottle from his doc. The next day he handed me one.



00:00 Dosed one 150 mg with a beer.



00:30 Feels similar to smoking weed at first, giggly kinda hyper having a good time, similar as well to valium.



01:00 The drug turned on me suddenly, I was glued and could not move but still felt euphoric, I had all this energy but couldn't move if I wanted to.



06:00 Coming down, had a wonderful time. Like xanax valium and hydros mixed into one pill. The bottle said that users feel `high' and that past drug abusers should not take them. I believe it now!

\end{document}
